tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: “He was an accidental diplomat – he worked on issues that mattered to him and that led him to focus on decolonization, peac…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: “He was an accidental diplomat – he worked on issues that mattered to him and that led him to focus on decolonization, peacekeeping and mediation.” – Ralph Bunche III speaking about his grandfather and #HeroesofUSDiplomacy honoree Dr. Ralph J. Bunche go.usa.gov/xdB3n.
